title: that font is?

author: mcfree

comments.content: You've posted in the General Discussion forum, where, if you would but read it, the forum description specifically says All topics are welcome—except font ID requests. You might try asking on the Type ID board, where such questions are not only allowed, but desired [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821070548/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")
